availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Robertson (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Robertson. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant and captain from December 24, 1861, to April 13, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 83.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 744-45.
Joseph R. Reinhart, A History of the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry U.S.: The Boys Who Feared No Noise (Louisville: Beargrass Press, 2000), 400.
KYR-0002-022-0054.
